question: Two wires A and B are made of same material. Their diameters are in the ratio of 1:2 and lengths are in the ratio of 1:3. If they are stretched by the same force, then increase in their lengths will be in the ratio of
explanation: Ratio Δl₁/Δl₂ = (l₁/l₂) * (r₂/r₁)² (since F and Y are same).
